org.bubblecloud.zigbee.api.cluster.impl.api.core

Interface ZCLCluster

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Alarms, AnalogInput, Basic, BinaryInput, ColorControl, Commissioning, DeviceTemperatureConfiguration, DoorLock, ElectricalMeasurement, FanControl, FlowMeasurement, GenericTunnel, Groups, IASACE, IASWD, IASZone, Identify, IlluminanceLevelSensing, IlluminanceMeasurement, LevelControl, Metering, OccupancySensing, OnOff, OnOffSwitch, OnOffSwitchConfiguration, PowerConfiguration, PressureMeasurement, PumpConfigurationAndControl, RelativeHumidityMeasurement, RSSILocation, Scenes, ShadeConfiguration, TemperatureMeasurement, Thermostat, ThermostatUserInterfaceConfiguration, Time, WindowCovering
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlarmsCluster, AnalogInputCluster, BasicCluster, BinaryInputCluster, ColorControlCluster, CommissioningCluster, DeviceTemperatureConfigurationCluster, DoorLockCluster, ElectricalMeasurementCluster, FanControlCluster, FlowMeasurementCluster, GenericTunnelCluster, GroupsCluster, IASACECluster, IASWDCluster, IASZoneCluster, IdentifyCluster, IlluminanceLevelSensingCluster, IlluminanceMeasurementCluster, LevelControlCluster, MeteringCluster, OccupancySensingCluster, OnOffCluster, OnOffSwitchConfigurationCluster, PowerConfigurationCluster, PressureMeasurementCluster, PumpConfigurationAndControlCluster, RelativeHumidityMeasurementCluster, RSSILocationCluster, ScenesCluster, ShadeConfigurationCluster, TemperatureMeasurementCluster, ThermostatCluster, ThermostatUserInterfaceConfigurationCluster, TimeCluster, WindowCoveringCluster, ZCLClusterBase

    public interface ZCLCluster
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision: 799 $ ($LastChangedDate: 2013-08-06 19:00:05 +0300 (Tue, 06 Aug 2013) $)
    Author:
    Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi, Francesco Furfari

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void enableDefaultResponse()
      This method enable the Default response command to be sent by the device that
      receives the Command
      Attribute getAttribute(int id) 
      Attribute[] getAvailableAttributes()
      This method returns an Attribute array containing the Attribute that are actually
      implemented on the cluster instance.
      short getId()
      This method return the actual ClusterId.
      int getManufacturerId() 
      java.lang.String getName() 
      Attribute[] getStandardAttributes()
      This method returns an Attribute array containing the Attribute defined by
      the specification of the cluster.
      Response invoke(Command cmd)
      This method is an alias for #invoke(Command, false)
      Response invoke(Command cmd, boolean suppressResponse)
      This method invokes the Command on this Cluster and wait for its Response
      boolean isDefaultResponseEnabled() 

    • Method Detail

      • isDefaultResponseEnabled

        boolean isDefaultResponseEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if and only if the Default response command is enabled

      • enableDefaultResponse

        void enableDefaultResponse()
        This method enable the Default response command to be sent by the device that
        receives the Command

      • getId

        short getId()
        This method return the actual ClusterId. Please remember that the final and official ClusterId
        is defined by the Profile even if the Cluster is defined by a Cluster Library.
        Returns:
        the ClusterId

      • getManufacturerId

        int getManufacturerId()
        Returns:
        This method returns -1 if and only if no Manufacturer specific extension
        are implement, otherwise it returns the ManufacturerId

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        This method return the String identifying the human readable name of the cluster.
        The name is assigned by the document defining the Cluster, either the Cluster Library or
        or the Profile

      • getAvailableAttributes

        Attribute[] getAvailableAttributes()
        This method returns an Attribute array containing the Attribute that are actually
        implemented on the cluster instance. Hence this method should return even the Attribute
        defined by the Manufacturer.
        Returns:
        The Attribute arrays

      • getStandardAttributes

        Attribute[] getStandardAttributes()
        This method returns an Attribute array containing the Attribute defined by
        the specification of the cluster. Hence, this method returns all Attribute defined
        either as Mandatory or as Optional, but does not return the Attribute
        defined by the Manufacturer.
        Returns:
        The Attribute arrays

      • invoke

        Response invoke(Command cmd)
                throws ZigBeeClusterException
        This method is an alias for #invoke(Command, false)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        ZigBeeClusterException
        See Also:
        invoke(Command, boolean)

      • invoke

        Response invoke(Command cmd,
              boolean suppressResponse)
                throws ZigBeeClusterException
        This method invokes the Command on this Cluster and wait for its Response
        Parameters:
        cmd - the Command to invoke
        if - suppressResponse true Default response are disabled
        Returns:
        Response the response to the invoked Command. This method returns null
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        ZigBeeNetworkManagerException
        ZigBeeClusterException

      • getAttribute

        Attribute getAttribute(int id)
        Parameters:
        id - the id of attribute to get
        Returns:
        Attribute identified by the given id
        Since:
        0.2.0
